post:
RaidLogic.NET Virtual Private Server line is the ideal solution for clients who require the control of a dedicated server matched with the affordability and simplicity of a traditional shared hosting account. Look over our plans, standard features and customization options. You can order and customize your plan online and we'll get you set up right away. If you have any questions, please contact us by phone, e-mail or live chat.

 

URL: http://www.raidlogic.net 

Email: sales@raidlogic.net 

Phone: +1.786.220.4995

Fax: +1.786.309.3555

Livechat: http://www.raidlogic.net/support/

 

=============================================================

RaidLogic.NET VPS (Virtual Private Servers) Linux - Self Managed

=============================================================

 

Your Virtual Private Server includes the following:

 

Redundant power backup.

Automated generator system.

Failed hardware replacement.

99.9% uptime guarantee.

No long term contract.

Intel® or AMD® Processors.

Full root access.

Access to SolusVM VPS control panel.

Free reboot ticket submission.

Free CISCO™ GUARD DDOS protection.

24x7x365 technical support.

24x7x365 network monitoring.

Private MRTG links*

1 IPv4 address and 2 IPv6 addresses.

 

Extra Features Included:

 

FREE DNS Hosting

FREE Migration included.

FREE 10GB Offsite FTP Backup Account.

FREE Enom Domain Reseller Account.

 

To order please choose the plan that is best for you.

 

=============================================================

=============================================================

RaidLogic.NET VPS (Virtual Private Servers) - Fully Managed

=============================================================

 

RaidLogic.NET managed VPS are fully managed by our highly trained server administrators. So if you are new to VPS or you are a seasoned veteran, rest assured that if you purchase one of our managed VPS, you have the peace of mind knowing that our server administrators are here to serve you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week!

 

Your VPS managed solutions includes:

 

Security updates, kernel updates

Disable unused services

OS updates and patches

Advanced policy firewall

Brute force detection

CHkrootkit (reports sent daily)

Logwatch installation and configuration

Disable of dangerours php functions

Compiler / fetch app. limiting

SIM (System Integrity Monitor)

cPanel/WHM, Plesk configuration*

cPanel/WHM or Plesk repairs & updates*

ICMP availability monitoring

Service monitoring (apache, ftp, dns, email)

Installation of intrustion detection systems

Proactive system & service trouble resolution

Proactive security & software updates.

System event monitoring

Plus a lot more...

 

Extra Features Included:

 

FREE DNS Hosting

FREE Migration included.

FREE Control Panel, cPanel, Plesk or Directadmin. 

FREE 10GB Offsite FTP Backup Account.

FREE Enom Domain Reseller Account.

HTTP Intrusion and DOS Protection.

Anti-Virus Protection & Spam Prevention.

 

 

To order please choose the plan that is best for you
